items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pretty and nice looking cashmere sweater, but a little itchy.
items.body: I ordered this 100% cashmere sweater in the Pink, and in a size Medium. It is a faint color beigish pink. It fits nicely. However, it is a little itchy on my arms and neck. This is a nice sweater to wear to work, or church. It feels like it will keep you warm in the winter. Read more
items.author: jrTEX

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars SHABADUER Women's 100% cashmere sweater
items.body: Fall warmth with a beautifully colored Cashmere sweater. This light orange is like a Peachy tan. Soft and subtle. It is definitely warm. Does itch my neck slightly but not totally uncomfortable. Soft feeling with a mock neck. Ordered according to the size chart and got a Large. Fits but a little snug for my comfort level. Read more
items.author: Fluttergirl

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful quality sweater!
items.body: This 100% cashmere sweater is beautiful and soft! It fits true to size. I normally wear a Medium so that's what I got and it fits great. Its a great quality fabric that is light in weight (as in doesn't feel super heavy) but it's a thick cashmere fabric and very warm! Read more
items.author: Emmi Lou

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and fits well.
items.body: Reviewing SHABADUER Women’s 100% Cashmere Crewneck Sweater Thick Knit, I was hoping when I ordered this, that it really would be pure cashmere. The blends are usually made with something very itchy to me. I am happy to report that it IS 100% pure cashmere. It’s not itchy. It does shed slightly, but not so bad I am constantly pulling cashmere out of my eyes or off my pants. The neck is a crewneck, so it keeps my head and neck warm. The shoulders are down slightly, rather than sitting right at my shoulder joint and the midriff has some extra fabric, for a non-clingy fit. The material is luxurious and the light pink (the color I ordered) is a muted, subtle, feminine shade. The fit is true-to-size and it’s my new favorite fall sweater! I love it. Read more
items.author: Summer

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Ligh Pink, Light Orange. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
